actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the availability of the transmissions of the House broadcasting system.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that transmissions of the House broadcasting system should be available to the public to the fullest extent possible and that no person should prevent any other person from access to such transmissions.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the availability of the transmissions of the House broadcasting system.
